name: Black Sap
entries: This tarry substance harvested from the dark boughs of the death's head willow is a powerful intoxicant. It can be smoked as a concentrate or injected directly into the bloodstream. A creature subjected to a dose of black sap cannot be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} for {@dice 1d6} hours.

For each dose of black sap consumed, a creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for {@dice 2d4} hoursâ€”an effect that is cumulative with multiple doses.
